summary: This module offers a reference implementation of the DiffPool hierarchical graph neural network using DGL and PyTorch. It includes data‑preprocessing utilities for graph features, adjacency matrices, and one‑hot label conversion, as well as a command‑line training script that loads benchmark graph classification datasets, constructs the DiffPool model, and runs training and evaluation loops.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to easily reproduce and benchmark DiffPool‑based graph classification, providing a baseline implementation for experimentation and further development of hierarchical graph pooling techniques.
